segments.text: Do you think that climate change is responsible for the recent floods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It could be . There are floods in this country almost every year , but in recent years they have been more widespread and more frequent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that the climate in this country is changing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The summers are hotter . The last three summers have been the hottest for the past 200 years . There have also been stronger winds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that the changing climate is a sign that we are causing too much damage to the environment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you ’ re right . Climate change naturally over time , but I think that human activities are speeding up the change . I wish that government would join together and try to resolve the problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . If we don ’ t do something soon , It might be too late .
segments.speaker: S1
